text: Kids See Ghosts was an American hip hop duo collaboration formed by Kanye West and Kid Cudi. The group had an album, Kids See Ghosts, released on June 8, 2018. The duo disbanded in 2022. ==Discography== Title Details Kids See Ghosts * Released: June 8, 2018 * Formats: Streaming audio, digital download ==References== Category:2010s music groups Category:2018 establishments in the United States Category:African-American musical groups Category:Hip hop bands Category:Kanye West Category:Musical duos Category:Musical groups established in 2018
title: Kids See Ghosts
